verses.text: 有關以東的預言俄巴底亞所見的異象。主耶和華指著以東這樣說：我們從耶和華那裡聽見了一個信息，有一位使者被派往列國去，說：「起來吧！我們起來與以東爭戰。」

words.note: Indicates the object of the verb following it.
Refers to a divine or spiritual vision.
Often refers to a divine or prophetic message.
Often refers to an angel or divine envoy in scripture.
Often refers to the Gentile nations in biblical context.

verses.text: 以東的刑罰看哪！我必使你在列國中成為弱小的，你必大受藐視。

words.note: Often refers to divine judgment or penalty.
An exclamation drawing attention, common in biblical texts.
Often implies disdain from a position of authority or spiritual judgment.

verses.text: 你心中的傲氣欺騙了你；你這住在巖石的隱密處，居所在高處的啊！你心裡說：「誰能把我拉下地呢？」

words.note: Often refers to pride against God or others.
Indicates the following noun is the direct object.

verses.text: 你雖如鷹高飛，在星宿之間搭窩，我也必從那裡把你拉下來。這是耶和華的宣告。

words.note: Often refers to a divine or authoritative statement.

verses.text: 竊賊若來到你那裡，強盜若夜間來到，豈不會偷竊直到夠了呢？你將會怎樣被滅絕！摘葡萄的若來到你那裡，豈不只剩下幾粒葡萄嗎？

words.note: Used to form a rhetorical question with an expected affirmative answer.
Often refers to divine judgment leading to utter destruction.

verses.text: 以掃要怎樣被搜索，他收藏的寶物被搜查出來。
曾與你結盟的，都把你送到邊界；本來與你友好的，卻欺騙你，勝過你；與你同席的（「與你同席的」或譯：「吃你的食物」），在你腳下暗設網羅，你卻毫不曉得。

words.note: Verb-object compound: 'form alliance'
Lit. 'same mat/table'
Part of parenthetical alternative translation
Part of parenthetical alternative translation
Part of parenthetical alternative translation
Part of parenthetical alternative translation
Indicates an alternative translation
Part of parenthetical alternative translation
Part of parenthetical alternative translation
Part of parenthetical alternative translation
Part of parenthetical alternative translation
Often refers to a spiritual or dangerous trap in biblical contexts.
More classical/literary than 知道 (zhīdào).

verses.text: 耶和華宣告說：到那日，我豈不從以東滅絕智慧人嗎？豈不從以掃山除掉聰明人嗎？

words.note: Common phrase in prophecy, 'the Day of the Lord'.

words.definition: how could it not, isn't it
words.note: Used to form rhetorical questions, implying the answer is 'yes'.

words.definition: how could it not, isn't it
words.note: Used to form rhetorical questions, implying the answer is 'yes'.
山 (shān) means mountain.

verses.text: 提幔哪！你的勇士要驚惶，因此在以掃山上人人被殺戮剪除。

words.note: 山 (shān) means mountain.
Used as a locative suffix here.
Reduplicated character emphasizing 'every'.
Often used in biblical context for divine judgment or cutting off a lineage.

verses.text: 懲罰以東的原因因你對兄弟雅各行強暴，你必受羞辱，永被剪除。

words.note: Often used in biblical context for divine judgment or cutting off a lineage.

verses.text: 外地人劫掠雅各財物的日子，外族人進入他的城門，為耶路撒冷抽籤；那時你竟袖手旁觀，甚至好像他們中間的一分子！

words.definition: stand by idly, look on passively
words.note: An idiom describing inaction despite being present.

verses.text: 你兄弟遭遇禍患的日子，你不該看著不理；猶大人被滅的日子，你不該幸災樂禍；他們遭難的日子，你不該張口狂傲；

words.note: Literally 'watch without managing/caring'.
An idiom meaning to take pleasure in others' suffering.
Literally 'open mouth arrogantly'.

verses.text: 我子民遭災的日子，你不該進入他們的城門；他們遭災的日子，你不該看著他們受苦；他們遭災的日子，你不該搶奪他們的財物。
你不該站在岔路口，剪除他們中間逃脫的人；他們遭難的日子，你不該把他們生還的人交出來。
耶和華的日子臨近萬國了，人必照你所行的向你施行，你的報應必歸到你的頭上。

words.note: Refers to the 'Day of the LORD' in prophecy.
Used impersonally, similar to 'they' or 'one' in English.
Forms a nominal phrase with the verb that follows.
Often used in religious or moral contexts for karma/judgment.

verses.text: 你們怎樣在我的聖山上喝過苦杯，萬國也必照樣不住地喝，他們要喝，並且要吞下去，他們就不再存在了。

words.note: Used as a location suffix
Metaphorical for suffering

verses.text: 雅各家將來的復興但在錫安山上必有逃脫的人，那山必成為聖；雅各家必得回他們原有的產業。

words.note: Refers to the descendants/nation of Jacob
Used as a location suffix
Refers to the descendants/nation of Jacob
Often refers to ancestral land or spiritual heritage in the Bible

verses.text: 雅各家必成為火，約瑟家必成為火燄；以掃家卻像碎稭，被它們焚燒吞滅，以掃家再沒有生還的人了。因為耶和華已經說了。

words.note: Refers to the descendants/tribes of Joseph
Refers to the descendants/nation of Esau (Edom)
Often used metaphorically for something worthless, easily destroyed

verses.text: 南地的人必佔有以掃山，低地的人必佔有非利士人之地；他們必佔有以法蓮的田野和撒瑪利亞的田野；便雅憫人必佔有基列。

words.note: Refers to the southern region of ancient Israel
Also known as Mount Seir, home of Edomites
Refers to the western foothills of Judah
Classical equivalent of '的'
Refers to the territory of the tribe of Ephraim

verses.text: 被擄到哈臘的以色列人，必佔有迦南人的地，直到撒勒法；被擄到西法拉的耶路撒冷的人，要佔有南地眾城。

words.note: Refers to the southern region of ancient Israel

verses.text: 必有拯救者登錫安山，審判以掃山，國權就屬於耶和華了。

words.note: Indicates certainty or necessity.
Lit. 'one who saves/rescues'.
Can be a verb 'to judge' or a noun 'judgment'.
Refers to the ultimate power and authority of a kingdom or God.
Indicates a result or consequence.
The divine name YHWH, often translated as LORD.
Indicates a new situation or completed action.
